amendatorysection.catchline: Foreign corporation; amended certificate of authority.
amendatorysection.para: (a) A foreign corporation authorized to transact business in this state must obtain an amended certificate of authority from the Secretary of State if it changes:
(2) The period of its duration; or
(3) The state or country of its incorporation.
(b) The requirements of section 21-19,148 for obtaining an original certificate of authority apply to obtaining an amended certificate under this section.
